mapper.sql: id, customer_id, occupation_id, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_occupation WHERE customer_id=#{customerId} AND occupation_id=#{occupationId}
mapper.insert: insert into customer_occupation (id, customer_id, occupation_id, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{occupationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
